oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Christian Brothers Band and Choral Club Present: A Joyous Christmas
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Christmas carols; Choirs (Music); Bands; Programs; Music; Singers; Singing
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Ralph Hale conducted the 1955 Christmas Concert, and Brother Arnold was the choral director. The performance included many standards, and closes with Silent Night and the "C.B.C. War Hymn" AKA the fight song.
